item.title: By: Jamieanne
item.dc:creator: Jamieanne
item.description: Hi Anita! I was just introduced to your blog today by your sister! Your niece is in my son‚Äôs kindy class! I just wanted to stop by and say hello to a fellow foodblogger, and also this caramel slice looks amazingly delicious! Loving the darkness of the caramel (the caramel layer in so many caramel slices is way too light-coloured; I much prefer the darker versions! )!
